translation.Message_0_Page_0: You should get in contact with the survivors first. Be careful, they might be dangerous. Be ready for anything.
translation.Message_1_Page_0: Work to gain the trust of the survivors. We'll need their help if we want to be able to liberate the mainland. We'll also need contact to see if there's any help out there, try looking for something like a radio.
translation.Message_2_Page_0: We should try and setup that radio you got there. It looks like it'll need some strange parts, though. Maybe the survivors have them.
